title: HTML5 Player Chromecast Demo
subtitle: Chromecast
description:
Cast video directly to your screen using Chromecast and the VisualOn HTML5 Player. Our HTML5 Player supports Chromecast for the HLS and MPEG-DASH protocols and Widevine and PlayReady DRMs.

Click here to learn how to enable Chromecast sender and receiver.

Note: This feature is supported on Chrome only.
